data.title: Real-Time Cybersecurity Alerts
data.meta_description: Protect your digital assets with Sec1Hawk's real-time alerts for vulnerabilities and OWASP Top 10 risks: comprehensive multi-channel notifications and customizable security insights.
data.text:
Introducing Sec1Hawk

Stay Ahead of Cyber Threats

Real-time vulnerability alerts. Multi-channel notifications. Comprehensive protection.

Bundles & Pricing

New, Latest CVEs/Vulnerabilities · Security Updates · Owasp Top 10

Severity-Based Alerts

Prioritize your response with alerts categorized by severity levels.

Ecosystem Coverage

Comprehensive alerts across various products and ecosystems.

Flexible Frequency

Choose from real-time, weekly, or monthly alert frequencies.

Multi-Channel Notifications

Receive alerts via email, Slack, Teams, ServiceNow, Jira, Zoom Chat, Trello, and many others.

Exclusive Insights

Stay informed with Zero-Day, KEV, and OWASP Top 10 alerts.

Customizable Dashboard

Tailor your view for efficient threat management and response.

Powerful Features for Unmatched Security

Explore the comprehensive tools designed to keep your digital assets secure and give you peace of mind.

START YOUR VULNERABILITY NOTIFICATION (CVEs) JOURNEY

Frequently Asked Questions

Our system processes and sends alerts in near real-time, typically within minutes of a new vulnerability being detected.

Yes, you can choose from multiple channels including email, Slack, Teams, ServiceNow, Jira, Zoom Chat, and Trello. You can set up multiple channels for different teams or severity levels.

Our Zero-Day alerts leverage advanced threat intelligence and machine learning to identify potential vulnerabilities before they’re widely known, giving you a crucial head start in protecting your systems.

We use a combination of industry-standard scoring systems (like CVSS), our proprietary risk assessment algorithms, and real-time threat landscape analysis to determine and categorize alert severity.
